com.mr.http

接口 MR_RetryPolicy

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MR_DefaultRetryPolicy

    public interface MR_RetryPolicy
    Retry policy for a request.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getCurrentRetryCount()
      Returns the current retry count (used for logging).
      int getCurrentTimeout()
      Returns the current timeout (used for logging).
      void retry(MR_VolleyError error)
      Prepares for the next retry by applying a backoff to the timeout.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCurrentTimeout

        int getCurrentTimeout()
        Returns the current timeout (used for logging).

      • getCurrentRetryCount

        int getCurrentRetryCount()
        Returns the current retry count (used for logging).

      • retry

        void retry(MR_VolleyError error)
           throws MR_VolleyError
        Prepares for the next retry by applying a backoff to the timeout.
        参数:
        error - The error code of the last attempt.
        抛出:
        MR_VolleyError - In the event that the retry could not be performed (for example if we ran out of attempts), the passed in error is thrown.
